original_text: And all the people came up after him, and the people piped with pipes, and rejoiced with great joy, so that the earth rent with the sound of them.
korean_text: 모든 백성이 그를 따라 올라와서 피리를 불며 크게 즐거워하므로 땅이 그들의 소리로 말미암아 갈라질 듯하니

sentences.original_text: And all the people came up after him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 백성이 그를 뒤따라 올라갔고

sentences.original_text: and the people piped with pipes
so that the earth rent with the sound of them
